Blacknightmare::

Blacknightmare moved quickly and the optics hit in one of her wings. 
She ignored the pain and fire two feather missiles more


--- In nbwrpg@y..., KSLawdogg@c... wrote:
> Predator:
> 
> 
> 
> Jumping to the side and landing, the missiles exploding, the shock 
wave 
> shaking his internals.  Getting up, Predator fired off ten rapid 
optic blasts 
> at Blacknightmare's neck.
